query: mutation createLocation($command: CreateLocationCommandInput!) {  createLocation(command: $command) {  ...location  __typename  } }  fragment location on Location {  reference  name  address  addressLine1  addressLine2  addressLine3  postcode  city  countryCode  region {  ...region  __typename  }  financialDimension {  ...financialDimension  __typename  }  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }  fragment region on Region {  reference  name  financialDimension {  ...financialDimension  __typename  }  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }  fragment financialDimension on FinancialDimension {  reference  code  description  target  dimensionType  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
